Uses of Class
org.newsclub.net.unix.AFSocketAddress

Packages that use AFSocketAddress
Package
Description
org.newsclub.net.unix
The junixsocket base implementation, including support for AF_UNIX sockets.
org.newsclub.net.unix.rmi
Provides code that allows RMI communication over AF_UNIX sockets.
org.newsclub.net.unix.server
